meta.content:
___ Leading By Example
As education evolves and school systems explore unconventional methods of teaching students, there is a need for forward-thinking guidance to strengthen districts and empower administrators who are molding America’s future.
___ Our Fundamentals

img.p: If your district is looking for ways to keep students on task while engaging in digital curriculum and distance learning during these challenging times, take a moment to consider our virtual learning solutions for grades 6-12, which are already being implemented in your state.

a.class: fusion-button button-flat button-medium button-custom button-1 fusion-button-span-no fusion-button-default-type buttons
a.title: Learn More

img.p: We provide our partners with progressive solutions aimed at eliminating the persistent disparity of academic opportunities for students confronted with socioeconomic challenges.

a.class: fusion-button button-flat button-medium button-custom button-2 fusion-button-span-no fusion-button-default-type buttons
a.title: Learn More

img.p: EdisonLearning is sensitive to the challenges that the spread of COVID-19 and school closures have created for our nation’s schools and students. To assist educators in the transition from brick and mortar to virtual instruction and serve our displaced students, EdisonLearning is offering free access to our educator training and professional development webinar series through June 30, 2020.

p.span: EdisonLearning continues a legacy of implementing the most innovative and extensive portfolio of proven K-12 school designs used in public education. We focus on establishing a school environment that promotes student learning and success; a full and rich curriculum; and the ongoing training and professional development of high performing administrators and teachers.

a.class: fusion-button button-flat button-medium button-custom button-3 fusion-button-span-no fusion-button-default-type buttons

div.p: Turning around failing schools and failing school districts is hard work. EdisonLearning has historically served the most challenging urban schools and districts in our country — a fact that will never change. We have not always succeeded, but, unlike others in our industry, EdisonLearning will not shy away from these tough jobs — we will embrace them.

div.class: fusion-fullwidth fullwidth-box fusion-builder-row-4 fusion-parallax-none nonhundred-percent-fullwidth non-hundred-percent-height-scrolling
fusion-layout-column fusion_builder_column fusion_builder_column_1_2 fusion-builder-column-8 fusion-one-half fusion-column-first 1_2

p.span: EdisonLearning is a leading international educational services provider. For nearly a generation, we have been at the forefront of some the most dramatic changes in America’s public education system.

Our outcomes are not solely based on student test scores – but on graduation rates, college acceptances, and meaningful jobs. We believe success is not solely about achieving academic results, but it’s about securing futures.

div.p: If your district is looking for ways to keep students on task while engaging in digital curriculum and distance learning during these challenging times, take a moment to consider our virtual learning solutions for grades 6-12, which are currently already being implemented in your state.
